frontmatter.title: Changelogs
frontmatter.meta_title: EvaStore - Shopify mobile store by React Native and GraphQL
frontmatter.meta_description: EvaStore and its massive source of various styles, look & feel navigations, mobile templates, convert your Online shops from Shopify website to mobile apps.

markdownRemark.html:
version 1.1.0 (15/11/2018):

1. Fix color attribute UI
2. Fix text in box attribute 
3. Remove unnecessary libraries
4. Fix minor bug and UI improvement
5. Update latest Expo 31.0.5
6. Create new video guide - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLcF-HiQy-jOLpn4F8p1nCpEdplyDM9kZQ

version 1.1.0 (06/11/2018): 

1. NEW - add the config for left margin on the homepage
2. NEW - update latest Expo 31 which could cause VERY SLOW at development mode (as you will get the "require cycle: " warning, please remove the IF block from node_modules/metro/src/lib/polyfills/require.js (line 102) - Or, select the build with PRODUCTION MODE to resolve the issues)
3. NEW - update performance loading
4. UPDATE - minor bug fix and update the build more faster.

version 1.0.0 (01/10/2018): 

RELEASE FIRST VERSION
